document.full_text: erin brockovich, a u.s. consumer health advocate whose life story was the basis for an academy award-winning film, urged senators tuesday to pass a law to document disease clusters in the united states.
document.title: erin brockovich pushes for disease cluster law
lines_and_colors: erin brockovich, a u.s. consumer health advocate whose life story was the basis for an academy award-winning film, urged senators tuesday to pass a law to document disease clusters in the united states.
